informacion.resumen: Your virtual reality platform, on your game engine.
informacion.detalles: Imagine a completely free and open source social VR platform, utilizing the community and the power of Godot Engine 4.
informacion.descripcion: Imagine a completely free and open source social VR platform, utilizing the community and the power of Godot Engine 4.
informacion.descripcion2: V-Sekai, A completely community-run, self-hostable MIT open source software stack built with Godot Engine 4.
